ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Nice to see
you again.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2101_01_10:
I was looking for stones and found this. You can
have it.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2102_01_10: Oh yes, I have something I want to give you.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2102_02_10: I thought it might make you happy. Do you like it?
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], I have a present for
you. Here, take it!
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2103_02_10: *chuckle* This is to say thank you.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
You always give me gifts of greater value
than that.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2202_01_10:
I want to hear stories about you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
I always look forward to talking to you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2302_01_10: This is for me? Thank you. I’ll take good care of it.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2301_01_10: This...is for me? Thank you! I’m so happy!
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2301_02_10: I’ll get you something in return!
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2402_01_10: I had such a fun time. See you later.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2401_01_10:
Oh, is it that time already? We were talking for
so long.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Your stories are always interesting. Let’s
talk again sometime!
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
A place of relaxation where people can gather
and interact...
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
You could discover friends with similar interests.
And here, dreams can grow.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
The discussions about stones I have with my rock
pals are quite fun.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
When you have friends that share your interests,
time flies so quickly...
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
You should join me and my rock pals next
time we’re chatting about stones,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
There have to be stones hidden around the world
that no one’s ever seen before.
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
I do get excited when I hear about new stones
found in different regions, but...
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I wonder how it’d feel to find an unknown stone
with my own hands...
ch0090_00_daigo_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
Just thinking about it makes me shake with
excitement!
